es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api

Interface IAmLegendController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmLegendController

    public interface IAmLegendController
    Interface for controller of AmLegend. Details of AmLegend and its properties in AmCharts API
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
